org.crosswire.common.config.swing
类 StringArrayField

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.crosswire.common.config.swing.StringArrayField
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Field
public class StringArrayField
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Field

A StringArrayField allows editing of an array of Strings in a JList. It allows the user to specify additional classes that extend the functionality of the program.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格

嵌套类摘要
static class StringArrayField.InputPane
          The panel for a JOptionPane that allows editing a name/class combination.

构造函数详细信息

方法详细信息

setChoice

public void setChoice(Choice param)
从接口 Field 复制的描述
Some fields will need some extra info to display properly like the options in an options field. FieldMap calls this method with options provided by the choice.

指定者：
接口 Field 中的 setChoice
参数：
param - The options provided by the Choice
